author: Dan Watson
description: Looks like a Pina Colada and indeed tastes a lot like a Pina Colada but overproof rum, fino sherry and falernum ensure this is no ordinary Pina Colada.
name: In the August Sun
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
